title: Business Innovation and Investment (Permanent) visa
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== Subclass 888 Business Innovation and Investment (Permanent) visa For entrepreneurs, investors and business owners to continue their activity in Australia. Basic Eligibility hold a relevant stream of the subclass 188 visa or in relation to applications for a subclass 888 visa in the Business Innovation stream, hold a relevant stream of the subclass 188 visa, or a subclass 444 (Special Category) visa, or a subclass 457 (Business (Long Stay)) visa granted in certain circumstances.
main_content:
===== main placeholder ==========================================

Subclass 888

Subclass 888

# Business Innovation and Investment (Permanent) visa

Business Innovation and Investment (Permanent) visa

For entrepreneurs, investors and business owners to continue their activity in Australia.

For entrepreneurs, investors and business owners to continue their activity in Australia.

### Basic Eligibility

Basic Eligibility
- hold a relevant stream of the subclass 188 visa or in relation to applications for a subclass 888 visa in the Business Innovation stream, hold a relevant stream of the subclass 188 visa, or a subclass 444 (Special Category) visa, or a subclass 457 (Business (Long Stay)) visa granted in certain circumstances.
hold a relevant stream of the subclass 188 visa or in relation to applications for a subclass 888 visa in the Business Innovation stream, hold a relevant stream of the subclass 188 visa, or a subclass 444 (Special Category) visa, or a subclass 457 (Business (Long Stay)) visa granted in certain circumstances.
